meanings.definition: A type of chemotherapy drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed vincristines to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stored various vincristines in the pharmacy for cancer patients.
meanings.sent3: The vincristines danced around the body, targeting the cancer like tiny warriors.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the vincristines like brave soldiers ready for battle.
meanings.sent5: The vincristines worked tirelessly to defeat the cancer, like tiny heroes in her bloodstream.

meanings.definition: The plural form of vincristine, referring to multiple doses or types of the drug.
meanings.sent1: The nurse administered the vincristines to the patient at different times of the day.
meanings.sent2: The hospital ordered various vincristines to ensure they had enough for all the treatments.
meanings.sent3: The vincristines lined up on the shelf, waiting for their turn to fight the cancer.
meanings.sent4: The vincristines stood together, a united army against the cancer invading the body.
meanings.sent5: The room filled with the scent of vincristines, a reminder of the battle against cancer.
